title: Drawing, "Finishing the Toilet", ca. 1858
medium: Paper, brown ink, brown and blue wash
inscribed: Collector's stamps on reverse: ex-Collection Picot, Lugt, 2027; Peoli, Lugt, 2020. "25 cts." written in pencil on back.
description: A lady seated in a chair by a table on which is a lighted lamp.  She wears a full skirt, an apron, and a cap on her head.  To the left is a man hairdresser in a smock and behind her right a maid both arranging her hair.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Finishing the Toilet", ca. 1858.
ca. 1858. Paper, brown ink, brown and blue wash. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-112.
